meanings.definition: The starting point of a trail.
meanings.sent1: We gathered at the trailheads before beginning our hike.
meanings.sent2: The map showed the location of the trailheads clearly.
meanings.sent3: The trailheads seemed to be hiding from us, playing a game of hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The trailheads stood like guardians, marking the entrance to the adventure ahead.
meanings.sent5: The trailheads beckoned us with promises of exploration and discovery.

meanings.definition: A marker or sign indicating the beginning of a trail.
meanings.sent1: The trailheads were painted in bright colors for easy visibility.
meanings.sent2: We followed the trailheads diligently to stay on the right path.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel moved the trailheads around, causing confusion for hikers.
meanings.sent4: The trailheads stood tall like beacons guiding us through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The trailheads were like friendly helpers showing us the way forward.
